description:
⑨ A simple scrolling game ⑨

Hello there, yorripi here. 
Thank you for viewing my first Unity game.

Known errors:

For some reason, I can't get the EnemySpawner script 
to work with the EnemyDestroyer script,
so you earn points as soon as the enemy spawns. 
This isn't ideal, but hey, at least it works.

For Mac, all three variants of enemies spawn,
however only one will work on Windows.
If I try to make all enemies spawn on windows, 
I get a multitude of errors,
so I am leaving it for now.

Also, not exactly an error, but there is no exit button, so you can
either play the game for eternity, or press alt+tab or any home button key
and close the window from there.

References:

This is pretty much a Touhou fan game. I love Touhou.
Please support the official work: https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Purchasing_Guide

All music heard in the game were created by ZUN, I simply remixed them.
